name: Boxed Up!
description:
Boxed Up! is a procedurally generated 3D platforming game with a unique take on physics platforming. 

Oh no! You fell of the delivery van! But Here at Fed-Up deliveries we dont give up! 

Roll, spin and jump through the hustle and bustle of the city streets to get yourself delivered! 

Avoid cracks, potholes, barricades and other obstacles as you race through the city!

Collect coins to add to your score, hearts to make sure you dont die and clocks to make sure your timer doesn't run out as you attempt to beat your high score!

This game was made for the Admix Spring Game Jam within the allotted time.

Can be played with a keyboard or remote.
